about_the_game:
[Overview]

"DebugDebut" is a simulation game where you earn money by doing serious debugging work.
An app that suddenly appears on your desktop.
When you start it up, an AI that generates games starts up.
This AI is still new and doesn't seem to be able to make games well.
So you become the debugger and start pointing out bugs in the game to fix them.
Can you point them out without making any mistakes?
And what is the true identity of this app?

[Game Description]

You need to find all the bugs in the game.
Read through the game description written on the checklist
Operate and check the game while comparing it with the description and materials.
Find all the behaviors that don't match the game behavior and the checklist items.
Bugs include simple ones such as

  • The character doesn't move

  • No sound

  • The UI isn't reflected

  • Only enemy D is invincible

  • Only block E is hit and miss

  • If you leave a certain screen for 2 minutes, it suddenly crashes

and more.
There is more than one game to debug.

  • Shooting

  • Puzzle

  • Card

  • Action

  • Horror

And many more.
If you miss a bug three times while debugging all the games,
you will lose the AI's trust and the debugging process will end.
Check carefully to avoid mistakes.
You can also use the rewards you get from debugging to make
extensions to make debugging easier.
Aim for the best debugging environment by preparing cheat tools that suit the game and asking for help from friends.

[Play time]

4 to 5 hours

[About video streaming]

Please check the official website.

name: DebugDebut
short_description: A debugging simulation game in which you complete debugging requests from a game generation AI that suddenly appears. Debug games of various genres and aim to win high rewards.
